channel.title: The Economy on TalkAboutBrex
channel.description: Recent content in The Economy on TalkAboutBrex

item.title: Brexit has already cost billions
item.description: The Bank of England has said that Brexit has already cost the UK £40 billion. That is around £900 per home.

item.title: We will be poorer in the long run
item.description: The Government estimates that the UK economy will be between 3.9% to 9.3% poorer over next 15 years if we go ahead with Brexit.
